short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: from agile to automation, making testing process efficient and seamless

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TS360 is designed to revolutionize QA by making test automation the norm. It streamlines test automation for Agile workflows, offering both low-code and no-code options. TS360 supports testing for web and will support mobile applications, providing a user-friendly experience with drag-and-drop functionality. The extension bridges the gap between Agile practices and automation, ensuring efficient and seamless testing processes.
